mapper.select: SELECT * FROM dc_order WHERE del_flag = 0 AND order_date = CURDATE() AND combo_id IN ( SELECT combo_id FROM dc_order o WHERE o.del_flag = 0 AND o.order_date = CURDATE() AND o.status != 2 GROUP BY combo_id HAVING COUNT(id) < #{minOrder} )

SELECT c.*,t.cnt FROM dc_combo c,(SELECT o.combo_id,count(*) as cnt FROM dc_order o WHERE o.eve_score is not null AND o.order_date >= #{startDate} AND o.order_date <= #{endDate} GROUP BY o.combo_id) t WHERE c.id = t.combo_id

SELECT c.*,t.cnt,t.avg FROM dc_combo c,(SELECT o.combo_id,sum(eve_score) as cnt,AVG(eve_score) as avg FROM dc_order o WHERE o.eve_score is not null AND o.order_date >= #{startDate} AND o.order_date <= #{endDate} GROUP BY o.combo_id) t WHERE c.id = t.combo_id ORDER BY t.cnt ASC LIMIT #{num}

SELECT c.*,t.cnt,t.avg FROM dc_combo c,(SELECT o.combo_id,sum(eve_score) as cnt,AVG(eve_score) as avg FROM dc_order o WHERE o.eve_score is not null AND o.order_date >= #{startDate} AND o.order_date <= #{endDate} GROUP BY o.combo_id) t WHERE c.id = t.combo_id ORDER BY t.cnt DESC LIMIT #{num}
